woon, wag op God se Woord – men-se smag-tend in hul nood na die God van

Give a thought to Africa 'neath the burning sun. Breath a prayer for Africa. God, the father's love
There are hosts of weary hearts waiting to be won. can reach down and bless all hearts, from His heav'n above.
Many lives have passed away; and in many homes And when lips are moved by grace, they so sweetly sing;
there are voices crying now to the living God. Pray for peace in Africa from our living God

Tell the love of Jesus by her hills and waters.
God bless Africa and her sons and daugters.
